verbose_text: They found ROS dependent killing of hepatocytes involved enhanced local ER-to-mitochondria Ca 2+ transfer (required IP3Rs and MCU) despite suppressed IP3R mediated Ca 2+ release, owing to ER MCS tightening and mitochondrial Ca 2+ uptake sensitization.
evidence: ROS-dependent killing of hepatocytes involved enhanced local ER-to-mitochondria Ca
